programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Talus on rebane kanakuuti sisse murdnud ning Miia ja Saara peavad kuudi korda tegema, enne kui rebane järgmise kana järele tuleb. Tsentoopias läheb Miia koos haldjatega külla sõpradele Mustmetsas, et sealt südamekristalli otsida. Simo kinnitusel peavad nad minema põllule, kus kasvavad elektrifitseeritud kärsslilled.

programme.title: Väike nõid Zouk
programme.desc: Mis teha, kui teie koju ilmub korraga kummitus? Eks ikka kutsuda kohale Zouk, väike nõid, tema leiab alati nõu!

programme.title: Sisekergejõustiku EM Istanbulis
programme.desc: Talvine kergejõustikuhooaeg kulmineerub Euroopa sisemeistrivõistlustega Istanbulis. Eesti koondise suurimad edulootused on seotud 7-võistlusega - viis aastat tagasi siseMM-il medali võitnud Maicel Uibo on ka tänavu Euroopa hooaja edetabelis kõrgel kohal, eelmisel talvel näitas kõrget taset siseMM-il 4. koha saavutanud Hans-Christian Hausenberg. 60 meetri jooksus kuulub Euroopa paremikku Karl Erik Nazarov, kes on kahel aastal järjest jõudnud tiitlivõistluste finaali - mullusel siseMM-il üllatas Nazarov 4. kohaga. Ülekandeid kommenteerivad Juhan Kilumets ja Helar Osila.

programme.title: Uue aja asjad
programme.desc: Arhiivimaterjalidele tuginev sari, mis näitab meid ümbritsenud materiaalset kultuuri iseseisvuse saavutamisele vahetult eelnenud, selle aegsel ja järgsel perioodil (1985-2005). Saade "Arvutid ja telefonid" jutustab sellest, kuidas toasuurusest arvutist sai õhuke sülearvuti ja välismaale helistamiseks ei pidanud enam minema postkontorisse, vaid seda sai teha koduselt diivanilt tillukese taskutelefoniga. Virtuaalne reaalsus muutus sedavõrd ligitõmbavaks, et nii mõnigi eestlane hakkas eelistama sealset elu siinsele. Teksti autor Juku-Kalle Raid, loeb Juhan Ulfsak. Režissöör Anne Mäns, produtsent Olavi Paide. Tootja Ruut.

programme.title: Suusaalade MM
programme.desc: Põhja suusaalade maailmameistrivõistlusi on peetud varsti juba sada aastat ja esmakordselt jõuavad need nüüd Sloveenia pinnale. Planica võõrustab MM-i 22. veebruarist kuni 5. märtsini ning maailmameistrid selguvad suusahüpetes, kahevõistluses ja murdmaasuusatamises. Eesti sportlased on esindatud kõigil neil aladel.

programme.title: Suusaalade MM
programme.desc: Põhja suusaalade maailmameistrivõistlusi on peetud varsti juba sada aastat ja esmakordselt jõuavad need nüüd Sloveenia pinnale. Planica võõrustab MM-i 22. veebruarist kuni 5. märtsini ning maailmameistrid selguvad suusahüpetes, kahevõistluses ja murdmaasuusatamises. Eesti sportlased on esindatud kõigil neil aladel.

programme.title: Koguperekontsert "Mina ka
programme.desc: Kas mäletad lugu kuningast, kes istus kuningamaal oma trooni peal, suvelaulude vaieldamatut hitti sellest, kui karvamütsiaeg oli ammuilma otsa lõppenud või kuidas O on ümmargune ja K on kandiline? Nii need kui ka mitmed teised popid lastelaulud kõlavad nüüd uues, hoogsas ja rütmikas kuues. "Mina ka" on koguperekontsert, mis pakub rõõmu igas vanuses publikule - lapsepõlvelaulude äratundmisrõõmu emadele ja isadele ning lahedaid leide nii tirtsudele, põnnidele kui ka poistele ja tüdrukutele. Laval astuvad üles Kristel Aaslaid, Birgit, Liis Lemsalu, Ivo Linna, Daniel Levi, Ott Lepland ja Liisi Koikson, Lasteekraani Muusikastuudio laululapsed jpt. Lauljaid saadab ansambel "Swingers" koosseisus Mihkel Mattisen klaveril, Indrek Sarrap bassil, Timo Vendt saksofonil ja viiulil ning Peep Kallas trummidel. Telesalvestuse režissöör on Kertu Köösel, juhtoperaator Andrus Rebane, produtsent Kadi Katarina Priske.

programme.title: Doktor Proktori puuksupulber
Doktor Proktors Prompepulver
programme.desc: Moodne ja lõbus muinaslugu kergelt hullumeelsest doktor Proktorist, kes leiutab kogemata maailma võimsaima puuksupulbri. Kahe kohaliku põngerja ootamatust külaskäigust doktori majja saab alguse isemoodi sõprus ja sensatsiooniline äriprojekt. Krapsakas patsidega Lise ja pisike punapea Bulle aitavad doktor Proktori puuksupulbrit kogu maailmale tutvustada. Üllas tegevus muutub aga ohtlikuks, kui kuri hr Thrane oma kahe jõleda jõmpsikaga haruldast leiutist enda valdusse tahavad saada.

programme.title: Sisekergejõustiku EM Istanbulis

programme.title: Mia ja Liki
programme.desc: Näib, nagu võiks suvi igavesti kesta. Õed Mia ja Liki võtavad suvest viimast, kuid märgid sellest, et nende vanematega on midagi pahasti, häirivad nende rõõmsat elu. Tüdrukud tajuvad enda ümber toimuvaid muutusi, ent ei suuda olukorda mõista, mis omakorda tekitab neis seletamatut hirmu ja segadust.

programme.title: Teemaõhtu kommentaarid
programme.desc: Saate OP! külaliseks on kirjanik Mart Kivastik.

programme.title: Isa
M. Kivastik
programme.desc: Lugu ennast kõiges piiravast üksikisast, kes püüab ka oma poega nii kasvatada. Mart Kivastiku esimene lühimängufilm. Peaosas Lembit Ulfsak, operaator Ago Ruus, kunstnik Toomas Hõrak, muusikaline kujundaja Toomas Lunge.

programme.title: Kümme kaadrit
programme.desc: Saatejuht Kristjan Jõekalda külaliseks on olümpiavõitja Gerd Kanter. Näeme kümmet kaadrit spordikangelase isiklikust fotoalbumist ja videomeenutusi tema sportlaseteelt lapsepõlvest suurvõitudeni.

programme.title: Ingmar Bergmani otsinguil
Searching for Ingmar Bergman
programme.desc: Ingmar Bergmani peetakse kõigi aegade tähtsamaiks filmitegijaks. Selles väga isiklikus dokumentaalfilmis jagab tuntud Saksa filmirežissöör Margarethe von Trotta oma nägemust Rootsi meistrist, läbi režissööri silmade, tuues lähemale Ingmar Bergmani töö ja isiksuse, kelle filmipärand kõnetab uue ajastu filmitegijaid.

programme.title: Ukraina Noorte Sümfooniaorkester Oksana Lõniviga
Young Euro Classic 2018 - Oksana Lyniv conducts the Youth Symphony Orchestra of Ukraine
programme.desc: Noorte Ukraina muusikute sütitaval kontserdil 2018. aasta Young Euro Classic festivalil kõlasid kahe Ukraina helilooja, Vitali Hubarenko ja Jevhen Stankovitši teosed, mida polnud varem Saksamaal esitatud. Orkestri juht on enesekindel Oksana Lõniv, kes õppis Münchenis Berliini Filharmoonikute dirigendi Kirill Petrenko käe all. Kaasa lööb ka Ukraina viiuldaja Valeriy Sokolov.(n)

programme.title: Seesama taevas
programme.desc: Larsi väljaõpe kannab vilja ja Lauren on võluvast noormehest peagi sisse võetud. Conrad ja Gita ei ole Klara olümpiaväljavaadete osas ühte meelt. Conradi kolleegil Axelil tekib lähedane suhe inglase Duncaniga.(n)

programme.title: Laske mind Lavale
programme.desc: Hariduslik-meelelahutuslik saatesari, mis jälgib kuue noore teekonda lavale. Mis neid näitleja elukutse juures paelub, miks soovivad nad oma elu teatriga siduda ning millistest väikestest ja suurtest väljakutsetest teatritöö koosneb? Eelviimane saade viib osalejad Tallinna Linnateatrisse, kus neile elab kaasa žürii koosseisus Piret Kalda, Indrek Ojari ja Andres Raag.(n)

programme.title: Laske mind Lavale
programme.desc: Hariduslik-meelelahutuslik saatesari, mis jälgib kuue noore teekonda lavale. Mis neid näitleja elukutse juures paelub, miks soovivad nad oma elu teatriga siduda ning millistest väikestest ja suurtest väljakutsetest teatritöö koosneb? Saatesarja viimane osa toob hulga üllatusi ja selgub võitja, kes viib koju auga teenitud magusa autasu. Enne ootavad noori aga viimased ülesanded, kus seekord tuleb end muuhulgas tõestada muusikali rollis! Žüriitoolidel võtavad koha sisse hõbekõrid Helgi Sallo, Priit Volmer ja Janne Ševtšenko.(n)

programme.title: Ernest ja Celestine
programme.desc: Ernest ja Celestine peavad plaani, kuidas oma naabrit aidata.(n)

programme.title: Hei, Kutsa
programme.desc: Oravad korraldavad Kutsale üllatuspeo.(n)

programme.title: Kollikool
programme.desc: Tiivusson uhkeldab koolis uute prillidega, aga kui teda narrima hakatakse, tunduvad prillid talle korraga nõmedad...(n)

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Miia ja Saara lähevad linna jäätist ostma ning kohtuvad härra Melóni, Saara klassijuhatajaga. Tsentoopias on haldjad mures: nad on leidnud kummalisi jalajälgi ega tea, kellele need kuuluvad. Õige pea saavad Miia ja ta sõbrad teada, et Tsentoopiasse on jõudnud ponisarvikud.(n)

programme.title: Kunksmoor ja kapten Trumm
programme.desc: Keset tuulist merd oli pisike saar, kus elas ainult Kunksmoor. Oma saarel keetis Kunksmoor punasest vasest katlas nõiarohtusid, millega ta oskas ravida igasuguseid haigusi ja tõbesid. Ühel päeval sattus saarele kapten Trumm... Nukufilm Aino Perviku lasteraamatu ainetel. Režissöör Heino Pars. Film on kirjeldustõlkega.(n)

programme.title: Väike nõid Zouk
programme.desc: Mis juhtub, kui nõid oma luua hooletusse jätab? Kas temast saab siis elu lõpuni jalamees?(n)

programme.desc: Yakari aitab koos Vana Venimusega püstkoda ehitada.(n)

programme.title: Joanna Lumley seninägemata seiklused
programme.desc: Sarja viimases osas näeme, kuidas Joanna Lumley külastab Iraani, Aserbaidžaani, Gruusiat, Türgit, Itaaliat, Haitit ja Kuubat.(n)

programme.title: Õelus
programme.desc: Pärast seda, kui Freddie ja Stuart tülli lähevad, kolib Stuart Ashi ning Violet Freddie juurde. Ei lähegi kaua aega, kui uued korterikaaslased üksteist hulluks ajavad. Violet ja Ash mõtlevad välja plaani, kuidas endine olukord taastada.(n)

programme.title: The Grey
programme.desc: In the North Pole within dramatic events, an oil drilling team faces harsh conditions and predatory wolves after their plane crash.

programme.title: The Mountain Between Us
programme.desc: Two strangers are united by necessity and circumstances after their plane crashes, leaving the two stranded on a snowy mountain. As they struggle to deal with the harsh elements and their growing despair, they find strength in each other to make a difficult journey in search of rescue.

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Set around the world of oil and drilling in the depths of the seas, where one of the American oil platforms exploded in 2010; which resulted in the largest oil spill in the history of the United States.

programme.title: The Family Man
programme.desc: In a weird twist of events, a successful businessman who has forgone his personal life for his career finds himself transported to another life, one where he never made the choice to prioritize his career and instead started a family with his college sweetheart.

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: The crew of a whaling ship faces an unexpected hurdle in the form of a giant whale that devastates the ship and leaves the crew stranded at sea. With the whale after them and no hope of rescue, the crew resorts to drastic measures in order to survive.

programme.title: Moonrise Kingdom
programme.desc: Set in the sixties, in an island in New England, a 12-year-old boy and girl fall in love and secretly plan to run away together. This angers the authorities in the island, and the situation escalates to the point where they attempt to track the young couple in all directions.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: As Peter Rabbit and his sisters enjoy sneaking into Mr. McGregor's vegetable garden, things get complicated when his nephew, Thomas, moves into his house and sets out to get rid of the rabbits.

programme.title: Dumplin'
programme.desc: Willowdean ('Dumplin'), is a full-bodied teenager and the daughter of a former beauty queen, who signs up in the Miss Bluebonnet Teen Pageant, revolutionizing the contest and the small Texas town.

programme.title: The House of Tomorrow
programme.desc: An unlikely bond forms between an isolated teen who longs to break out of his sheltered life with his grandmother, and a punk rock lover who has a heart condition. Through the music of punk rock, the two young men end up inspiring each other and changing both of their lives.

programme.title: Waves
programme.desc: A romantic drama that depicts one family's journey as the domineering father, who's often motivated by good intentions, tries to help the family, eventually sending all of the family members onto a journey to navigate love, forgiveness, and unity.(n)

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: When (Chris Brander) decides to take the next step in his relationship with (Jamie), but she only wants them to be friends, he goes to Los Angeles and becomes an attractive guy who works in the music industry. He travels with a new singer (Samantha) till he returns to his home town.(n)

programme.desc: An unlikely bond forms between an isolated teen who longs to break out of his sheltered life with his grandmother, and a punk rock lover who has a heart condition. Through the music of punk rock, the two young men end up inspiring each other and changing both of their lives.(n)

programme.title: Kalifornia
programme.desc: Brian and Carrie are a journalist duo who go on a cross-country ride to research serial killer murder sites. They share the ride with Early Grayce and his girlfriend, and they later discover that Grayce is a deranged killer himself.(n)

programme.title: Taken 2
programme.desc: The past comes back to haunt former CIA operative Bryan Mills when the father of one of the kidnappers he killed to rescue his daughter Kim comes after him and his family. With Bryan and his ex-wife captured, it's up to Kim to help her father escape his captors and save her mother.(n)

programme.title: Taken 3
programme.desc: Ex-government operative Bryan Mills finds his life shattered when he's falsely accused of a murder that hits close to home. As he's pursued by a savvy police inspector, Mills employs his particular set of skills to track the real killer and exact his unique brand of justice.(n)

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: A group of people wakes up in a remote area, not remembering when or how they ended up at this place, but they don't know they were carefully chosen for The Hunt.(n)

programme.title: The First Purge
programme.desc: When a new political party takes over the government, they conduct an experiment aiming to decrease the crime rate. For twelve hours, there will be no laws governing the streets of Staten Island. But when the surge of violence spills out of the city, it gives the first spark to a nation-wide event.(n)

programme.desc: In a weird twist of events, a successful businessman who has forgone his personal life for his career finds himself transported to another life, one where he never made the choice to prioritize his career and instead started a family with his college sweetheart.(n)

programme.title: Gold
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the movie revolves around Kenny Wells and Michael Acosta, two friends who set off on an adventure in the uncharted jungle of Indonesia in the hopes of finding gold.(n)

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: A trained gang performs a bank heist in an organized manner, and a federal agent is assigned to negotiate with them. Another agent is assigned to protect valuable assets inside a bank safe, leading to a series of negotiations from several ends.(n)

programme.title: Black and Blue
programme.desc: When a new African-American New Orleans cop witnesses a group of corrupt policemen ruthlessly kill a drug dealer, she tries to balance the two sides of her identity as the said men chase her all through the night to eliminate the evidence she has on them.(n)

programme.title: Red Sparrow
programme.desc: As former ballerina Dominika Egorova is recruited by a Russian intelligence service, she uses seduction to entrap a C.I.A. agent in order to expose a mole.(n)

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.(n)

programme.title: Premium Rush
programme.desc: Wilee is a bike courier in Manhattan. On this day, Wilee has a delivery that attracts the interest of a NYC detective, who starts to chase him in the streets of Manhattan.(n)

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: Sixty-five million years ago, an alien race, the "Creators", implanted an alloy, "Transformium", into the Earth. It is now excavated, along with the melted bodies of illegally hunted Autobots and Decepticons, by KSI industries to build transformer drones, like Galvatron. Optimus Prime, long in hiding from this hunt, emerges to defend his friends and face Galvatron who turns out to be an old enemy.

programme.title: Irresistible
programme.desc: A small Wisconsin town becomes the center of political attention, when a Democrat strategist named Gary tries to help a retired Marine Colonel run for mayor.

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: Bud Fox is an ambitious stockbroker who's willing to do whatever it takes to get to the top. He meets the legendary Wall Street player Gordon Gekko who gets him involved in his illegal schemes.

programme.title: Fair Game
programme.desc: CIA operative Valerie Plame is tracking a uranium deal that is rumored that Iraq will buy it from Niger, but the war in Niger erupts, and the US war on Iraq starts anyway. Her opposition husband Joe Wilson writes an article exposing the lie of the US administration, and the authorities avenge him.

programme.title: The Founder
programme.desc: The true story of how one man, Ray Kroc, turned a burger joint into one of the biggest food-chains in the world, turning McDonald's from a small, albeit popular, walk-up restaurant run by the brothers Mac and Dick McDonald into a franchise worth billions.

programme.title: Bombshell
programme.desc: A group of women try to take on Fox News head, Roger Ailes, due to his administration policy and the toxic male culture he is spreading in the network.

programme.title: Miss Sloane
programme.desc: A successful lobbyist finds herself in the fight of her life when she puts her strategic talents into trying to push for legislation to control guns. But as the powerful gun lobby rises up against her, she discovers that she is going against people who are willing to go to any lengths to stop her.

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington follows the comic misadventures of a young Peruvian bear with a passion for all things British, who travels to London in search of a home. Finding himself lost and alone at Paddington Station, he begins to realise that city life is not all he had imagined - until he meets the kindly Brown family, who read the label around his neck ('Please look after this bear. Thank you.') and offer him a temporary haven. It looks as though his luck has changed until this rarest of bears catches the eye of a museum taxidermist.(n)

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Optimus Prime finds his home planet, Cybertron, now a dead planet, and tries to find the person behind its death. He finds a way to bring the planet back to life, but in order to do so, he needs to find an artifact, which is on Earth.(n)

programme.desc: A group of women try to take on Fox News head, Roger Ailes, due to his administration policy and the toxic male culture he is spreading in the network.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: Dangerous criminal Richard B. Riddick (Diesel) is being transported to prison in a cargo spacecraft. When the spaceship is damaged by comet debris and makes an emergency crash landing on an empty desert planet, Riddick escapes. However, when predatory alien creatures begin attacking the survivors, Riddick joins forces with the crew to develop a plan to escape the planet.(n)

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Matt Murdock is a blind lawyer who has a secret identity; as he fights criminals at courtrooms by day, he's the masked vigilante Daredevil by night. He vows to fight crime and faces off against a criminal leader known as the Kingpin.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, Roland Deschain fights with everything he has to prevent his enemy, the Man in Black, from bringing down a structure that preserves reality. With the Man in Black trying to use psychic children to unleash darkness, Roland takes one of them in to save both him and the world.(n)

programme.title: Dredd
programme.desc: In a desolate, dystopian American metropolis, cops have the combined powers of judge, jury and executioner in a chaotic landscape of drugs and rampant crime. Top Judge Dredd and his young trainee take on the merciless drug Lord Ma-Ma, whose home base is a 200-story complex rarely frequented by judges.(n)

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: 30 years after what happened in the first movie LAPD officer K finds a secret that could cause chaos to society. During his investigation he finds former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who was missing for 30 years.(n)

programme.title: Paddington 2
programme.desc: Paddington is happily living with the Brown family in Windsor Gardens, where he becomes a popular member of the community. He finds a special book to give to his Aunt Lucy for her 100th birthday at Mr. Gruber's antique shop, and gets involved in a series of peculiar jobs to buy it.(n)

With the Man in Black trying to use psychic children to unleash darkness, Roland takes one of them in to save both him and the world.(n)

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Matt Murdock is a blind lawyer who has a secret identity; as he fights criminals at courtrooms by day, he's the masked vigilante Daredevil by night. He vows to fight crime and faces off against a criminal leader known as the Kingpin.(n)

programme.title: Dredd
programme.desc: In a desolate, dystopian American metropolis, cops have the combined powers of judge, jury and executioner in a chaotic landscape of drugs and rampant crime. Top Judge Dredd and his young trainee take on the merciless drug Lord Ma-Ma, whose home base is a 200-story complex rarely frequented by judges.(n)

programme.title: Friends with Kids
programme.desc: For many years, Julie and Jason were close friends with no romantic feelings for each other. They decide to have a child and raising him together, while keeping their own lives separate,to avoid all the problems of children that could spoil any intimate relationship between couples.(n)

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director falls for a prostitute-turned-actress and decides to professionally adopt her, while she in turn is having another affair simultaneously with the writer of the play they're working on.(n)

programme.title: The King of Staten Island
programme.desc: Having developed a state of arrested development following his father's death, Scott's coping mechanism has been smoking weed and daydreaming about the day he will become a tattoo artist. Until tragic revelations and new events force him to contend with his heritage of trauma and move on.(n)

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Mitch Buchannon, a devoted life guard who butts heads with a new recruit, as they uncover a crime that could threaten the future of the bay.(n)

programme.title: Knives Out
programme.desc: When the body of crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found, Detective Benoit Blanc takes charge of the crime investigation and finds himself involved in numerous events in search of the truth.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, Roland Deschain fights with everything he has to prevent his enemy, the Man in Black, from bringing down a structure that preserves reality. With the Man in Black trying to use psychic children to unleash darkness, Roland takes one of them in to save both him and the world.(n)

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore
programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga : Eclipse
programme.desc: With a vengeful vampire preparing for an attack on the Cullens, Bella and Edward clash over the former's wish to be turned as tensions rise between Edward and Jacob, threatening to give rise to the old enmity between werewolves and vampires.

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Child psychologist, Dr. Malcolm Crowe, sees a boy with a strange case: he receives visitations from ghosts who had unresolved traumas while alive. The mother consults the doctor to treat her son, but what if her son isn't really sick and what he sees bears truth to it.

programme.title: Uncle Drew
programme.desc: When Dax has trouble winning the Rucker Classic street ball tournament in Harlem, his desperation to make up for his past loss leads him to enlist the help of Uncle Drew, an elderly basketball legend whose solution to help Dax includes getting his old team back together for one last hurrah.

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore
programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.

programme.title: Million Dollar Baby
programme.desc: Thirty-one-year-old Maggie Fitzgerald works at a restaurant, but dreams of becoming a famous boxer. She looks for a coach to train her, and lonely Frankie Dunn seems to be the right one to do the job.

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: The biopic of the legendary country music singer, Johnny Cash. From his early days in a cotton farm, his marriage to June Carter and his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis. With an Oscar win and two nominations, this is a superb performance for a legendary singer.

programme.title: At Eternity's Gate
programme.desc: The film takes a look at the life of painter Vincent Van Gogh during the time he lived in his French exile, where he worked to develop his artistic sense, fighting his inner demons, and strengthening his bond with his friend French artist Paul Gauguin.

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: This film takes place in 1970s London; Terry Leather is a salesmen, happily married with children, and few secrets to keep. When an old friend, Martine Love, offers up a scheme to make some quick cash, Terry finds himself unable to refuse. With the help of a carefully selected crew including Kevin Swain and David Shilling, they rent a warehouse on Baker Street and begin tunneling to the nearby Loyd Bank. With their eye on the money stored in the bank’s safety deposit boxes, the crew finds themselves in for much more than they bargained.

programme.title: Anna
programme.desc: A victim of domestic abuse,Anna Poliatova, accepts an offer to become an undercover KGB assassin while working as a model. She shows indelible strength and fearsome determination to reach one goal: her freedom. But first, Anna must survive the conflicting agendas of the KGB and the CIA.

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: In the distant future, robots are created to help humans with their daily tasks. Detective Del Spooner begins to investigate the murder of a leading robotics scientist and discovers that a robot named Sonny is involved. He has to protect the fate of humans, and reconcile between them and the robots.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fearing an inevitable defeat under Hitler's leadership, a group of German politicians and military officers plan a political coup and attempt to assassinate Hitler during World War II.

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: A professional driver who works in criminal operations, is charged with transporting the daughter of a dangerous Chinese crime lord.

programme.title: The Tracker
programme.desc: Aiden Hakansson decides to travel to a deserted village in Italy where his wife and daughter were kidnapped fifteen years earlier, as he sets out to seek revenge on those responsible.

programme.title: The Bank Job

With their eye on the money stored in the bank’s safety deposit boxes, the crew finds themselves in for much more than they bargained.

programme.title: The Man with the Iron Fists
programme.desc: Set in feudal China, where a hunt for a treasure of gold takes place between a group of murderers ,warriors and a British soldier in a remote village,where a simple blacksmith tries to defend himself and his fellow residents.

programme.title: Anna
programme.desc: A victim of domestic abuse,Anna Poliatova, accepts an offer to become an undercover KGB assassin while working as a model. She shows indelible strength and fearsome determination to reach one goal: her freedom. But first, Anna must survive the conflicting agendas of the KGB and the CIA.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: Twenty years after the alien invasion that threatened the destruction of mankind, the alien mothership comes to Earth and the armies of the world have to work together to protect the planet from annihilation.

programme.title: Hollow Point
programme.desc: FBI agent Diane and DEA agent Max join forces to hunt down the dangerous criminal Thomas Livingston, but as their mission proves more challenging than they expected, they enlist the help of a crafty hitman whom Livingston previously wronged.

programme.title: The Warrior Queen of Jhansi
programme.desc: The epic tale of the heroism of Rani of Jhansi, the Indian queen who became a fearless freedom fighter who led her people into battle against the British Empire in 1857.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is heading towards Earth, threatening to destroy mankind, NASA sends a team of drillers and geologists, to drill inside the asteroid and blow it from the inside with a warhead.

programme.title: From Paris with Love
programme.desc: A personal aide to the U.S. ambassador in Paris named James Reese teams up with the American spy Charlie Wax to thwart a terrorist attack.

programme.title: Disturbing the Peace
programme.desc: After a ruthless biker gang rolls into town looking to cause chaos, a former Texas Ranger with a troubled past is forced to stop them.

programme.title: The Truth
programme.desc: The famous actress Fabienne reunites with her estranged daughter Lumir, after the mother publishes her memories. Their reunion makes them confront each other and truths are revealed.

programme.title: Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever
programme.desc: Two opposing secret agents must set aside their differences, as they team up to fight a common enemy, who has developed a micro-device that can terminate the human race.

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: The true story of a Nebraska cop who takes a job as a peacekeeper for the UN in post-war Bosnia and Herzegovina. What she thinks is a mission to help the war-torn country ends up revealing the corruption within the UN as she uncovers a human-trafficking ring that is being deliberately ignored.

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: An elite hitman is successful working in the shadows. Now he's teaching his trade to an apprentice who is related to one of his previous victims.

programme.title: Run The Race
programme.desc: Zach's plans for a better future are derailed when a serious knee injury forces him off the football field. As his brother steps in to try and fill the void, the bonds of brotherhood are put to the test.

programme.title: Made in Italy
programme.desc: The bohemian artist Robert travels to Tuscany with his estranged son Jack to fix the family's dilapidated house in order to sell it. But as they attempt to fix the house, they also mend their strained relationship.

programme.title: Zeroville
programme.desc: When an aspiring actor heads to Hollywood in the transitional period of the cinema industry, the two tattoos of Montgomery Clift and Elizabeth Taylor he has put him under scrutiny as he becomes an object of interest, eventually impressing a beautiful actress and embarking on a dream-like journey.
